text: Egha atrivim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E Israelian gumazamiziba bar, me e bagh arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofaba ko, ofan bar isia mɨghɨribar amuam.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ofa gamir gumaziba, Israelia bar men arazir kuraba gɨn amangamin ofaba bagha, 7plan memen kabav suegha, dar ghuziba inigha ghua ofa gamir dakozimɨn da kavamangi.
